title: Strategic Response Model Schema
description: Schema for representing strategic responses to triggers that affect business architecture domains.

responseTitle.description: The name or title of the Strategic Response

description.description: A detailed explanation of the Strategic Response and its intent

triggerId.description: Reference ID linking to the triggering event or driver

rationale.description: Structured rationale that justifies the Strategic Response

rationaleTitle.description: A short name for the rationale

description.description: A detailed explanation of the reasoning behind the response

driverType.description: Category of driver for the rationale

sourceDocument.description: Document or source that prompted this rationale

relatedKPIs.description: List of KPIs that this response intends to influence

priorityLevel.description: Urgency or criticality of the rationale

affectedDomains.description: Business architecture domains impacted by the response

impactedUnits.description: Organisation units impacted by the response

orgUnitTitle.description: Name of the impacted organisation unit

relationshipRole.description: Role played by the unit in relation to this response

impactDescription.description: Narrative of how the unit is affected

responseActions.description: Actions taken or planned as part of the Strategic Response

expectedOutcomes.description: Expected benefits or changes resulting from this response

performanceImplications.description: How the response affects KPIs or performance tracking
